radirius.merc.graphics.font

Interface Font

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Resource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrueTypeFont

    public interface Font
extends Resource
    An abstraction for fonts.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Method Detail

      • deriveFont

        Font deriveFont(float size)
        Derive another differently sized instance of this font. Very resource heavy, so only call this once (NOT every single frame)
        Returns:
        A newly sized font!

      • deriveFont

        Font deriveFont(int style)
        Derive another differently sized instance of this font. Very resource heavy, so only call this once (NOT every single frame)
        Returns:
        A newly sized font!

      • getSize

        float getSize()
        The size of the font.

      • getHeight

        float getHeight()
        Returns:
        The height of the font.

      • getWidth

        float getWidth(String what)
        Returns:
        The width of a given string in I, the font.

      • getMaxWidth

        float getMaxWidth(int len)
        Returns:
        The maximum width that a given string of length len could be.

      • getAverageWidth

        float getAverageWidth(int len)
        Returns:
        The average width of all number/letter characters, multiplied by len.

      • getFontTexture

        Texture getFontTexture()
        Returns:
        The overall texture used for rendering the font.
